data.message: Why are privacy settings different on mobile devices? For example, you can't share with friends and exclude a certain list. The friends except option makes you select each person which is time consuming.  I'm sure a lot of people would like to put up a post and exclude a list such as Work people.

replies.message: We're always working to improve the Facebook experience, Bryan. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/WnuJKl -Ryan
